name: Animal Farm Jigsaw Games for Toddlers, Babys and Kids
name_original: Animal Farm Jigsaw Games for Toddlers, Babys and Kids
description:
Looking for the ultimate children's game?

Your child likes farms, animals and should have fun, laugh and learn important things at the same time?


LEARN:
* Logical thinking
* Hand-eye coordination
* Goal-oriented thinking
* How to use the computer mouse and PC
* Decision-making skills


Then our educational, high-quality farm animals game for children and toddlers is the perfect game. In the game, children can solve a variety of different jigsaw puzzles with fun hand-drawn animal and farm motifs. The difficulty is completely freely adjustable.


Important: The game contains no links or advertising and is completely child-safe!

Surprise your child today with our farm animals educational game.

Your McPeppergames team
